p: We calibrated our model based on the rate of HIV prevalence among FSWs and the general population using data that were collected in 2010 16 and 2015. 6 The estimated HIV prevalence among FSWs were 50% in 2010 and 45.5% in 2017 ( online supplementary figure 1). We compared the estimated HIV incidence from our calibrated model with the HIV incidence rates that were reported by the UNAIDSâ€™s spectrum. 4 17 The HIV prevalence among the sex clients was estimated to be 14.5% in 2015. The estimated national HIV prevalence has remained constant at approximately 3% over the past decade.
